metadata.description: The name of the action group to be associated with the alerts actions

metadata.Description: List of recipients for the email alert separated by semicolon

properties.query: [concat('let resourceName = "',parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp','";let metricName ="CpuPercentage";let resourceProvider ="MICROSOFT.WEB";let resourceIdContains ="/SERVERFARMS/";AzureMetrics | where ResourceProvider== resourceProvider and ResourceId contains resourceIdContains and MetricName== metricName and Resource == toupper(resourceName) | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Maximum) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)| top 30 by TimeGenerated')]
properties.displayName: [concat(parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp',' Hosting Plan reporting high CPU usage')]

properties.Name: [concat(parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp',' Hosting Plan reporting high CPU usage')]
properties.Description: [concat('Check ',parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp',' Hosting Plan: Reporting high CPU usage')]

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: [concat('Check ',parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp',' Hosting Plan: Reporting high CPU usage')]

properties.query: [concat('let resourceName = "',parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp','"; let metricName ="MemoryPercentage";let resourceProvider ="MICROSOFT.WEB";let resourceIdContains ="SERVERFARMS";AzureMetrics | where ResourceProvider== resourceProvider and ResourceId contains resourceIdContains and MetricName== metricName and Resource == toupper(resourceName) | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Average) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)| top 30 by TimeGenerated')]
properties.displayName: [concat(parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp',' Hosting plan reporting low available memory')]

properties.Name: [concat(parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp',' Hosting plan reporting low available memory')]
properties.Description: [concat('Check ',parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp',' Hosting Plan: Reporting low available memory')]

AzNsNotification.CustomEmailSubject: [concat('Check ',parameters('deploymentId'),'-cd-hp',' Hosting Plan: Reporting low available memory')]
